title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Rush on Trump's immigration policy. House GOP leaders go to border, blast Biden. Biden asks NASA for volunteers to go to the border. Biden on supersonic jets. Protests Over Georgia voting law is proof of Rush's assertion that the left wants to end fair elections. John Boehner is bashing Rush, Trump and conservatives. Rush explains what happened to Boehner.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

An extensive look at Biden's gun grab, with Rush on Biden's intentions to restrict 2nd Amendment rights. Rush on Andrew Cuomo and sanctuary cities. Biden's gun speech today. MSNBC's Nicolle Wallace says another crazy thing and Rush talks about how she went to the dark side when she sold out Sarah Palin during the McCain campaign.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

The Biden White House isn't leaking like the Trump White House. We revisit Rush's admonition to Trump to stop the leaks. Callers on gun laws and Biden's ridiculous claim that the Georgia voting law is Jim Crow. Gillibrand says child care is infrastructure. Biden on infrastructure. Classic Rush lesson: If you want less of something tax it. EIB High Note: We look back at Rush playing the game he loved -- golf, at the 2001 Pebble Beach Pro-Am, video available at RushLimbaugh.com.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
